languages.text: {n}Комиссар встречает ваш удар с прямой спиной и высоко поднятым подбородком. Даже в глаза смерти он взирает с бесстрашием, достойным истинного дисциплинарного офицера Империума.{/n}
{n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар встречает ваш удар с прямой спиной и высоко поднятым подбородком. Даже в глаза смерти он взирает с бесстрашием, достойным истинного дисциплинарного офицера Империума.{/n}

traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは背筋を伸ばし、顔を上げてあなたの一撃を受け止める。帝国の真の軍士官にふさわしい恐れ知らずな態度で、死と向き合っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは背筋を伸ばし、顔を上げてあなたの一撃を受け止める。帝国の真の軍士官にふさわしい恐れ知らずな態度で、死と向き合っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}政委扬起了头，迎接你的攻击。他勇敢地面对死亡，临死前的无畏态度，确实对得起帝国政委这个称呼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委扬起了头，迎接你的攻击。他勇敢地面对死亡，临死前的无畏态度，确实对得起帝国政委这个称呼。{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}El Comisario recibe tu golpe con la espalda erguida y la barbilla levantada. Mira a la muerte con una osadía digna de un verdadero oficial disciplinario del Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario recibe tu golpe con la espalda erguida y la barbilla levantada. Mira a la muerte con una osadía digna de un verdadero oficial disciplinario del Imperium.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar nimmt deinen Hieb mit geradem Rücken und erhobenem Kinn hin. Er blickt dem Tod mit einer Furchtlosigkeit entgegen, die eines echten Disziplinaroffiziers des Imperiums würdig wäre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar nimmt deinen Hieb mit geradem Rücken und erhobenem Kinn hin. Er blickt dem Tod mit einer Furchtlosigkeit entgegen, die eines echten Disziplinaroffiziers des Imperiums würdig wäre.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire garde le dos droit et le menton fièrement relevé au moment où vous abattez votre bras. Il accueille la mort avec bravoure, avec toute la dignité d'un véritable officier de l'Imperium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire garde le dos droit et le menton fièrement relevé au moment où vous abattez votre bras. Il accueille la mort avec bravoure, avec toute la dignité d'un véritable officier de l'Imperium.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}Komiser, vurduğun darbeyi; başı dimdik, alnı açık bir şekilde karşılıyor. Ölümle yüzleşirken İmparatorluk'un hakiki disiplin subaylarına yaraşır bir şekilde gözlerinde korkunun esamesi okunmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin. He gazes into the face of death with a fearlessness worthy of a true disciplinary officer of the Imperium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yediği darbenin karşısında Komiser'in başı dimdik ve alnı açık. Ölümle yüzleşirken İmparatorluk'un tüm hakiki disiplin subaylarına layık bir şekilde gözlerinde korkunun esamesi okunmuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar
